thread.title: OFFICIAL RULES: Spurs Nation Tipoff Giveaway
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL RULES: Spurs Nation Tipoff Giveaway - San Antonio Express-News

author: Sponsored content provided by the San Antonio Express-News Circulation Department
title: OFFICIAL RULES: Spurs Nation Tipoff Giveaway
text:
NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. VOID WHERE PROHIBITED BY LAW. A PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING .
HOW TO ENTER: To enter “ Spurs Nation Tipoff Giveaway ,” look in the San Antonio Express-News Facebook page, Twitter Page, and online advertising, and find the Spurs Nation Tipoff Giveaway advertisement. Then visit mySA.com/tipoff and follow the instructions and enter your phone number. Once submitted, the entrant will receive a text message confirming their entry was accepted. Following completion and submission of the entry form, the entrant will receive a text message the November 2, 2015 at 9:00 a.m. confirming whether they have won or lost the prize designated for the day that they submitted their entry form. By participating in the Sweepstakes, each entrant unconditionally accepts and agrees to comply with and abide by these Official Rules and the decisions of the Sponsor, which will be final and binding in all respects. Limit one (1) entry per phone number per day during the Sweepstakes period outlined below. SMS text rates apply, and by entering your number, you are consenting to receive this offer plus additional coupons, offers and updates. Standard text message and data rates may apply. Entries become the property of the Sponsor and will not be returned. Proof of submission does not constitute proof of delivery or receipt. Sponsor is not responsible for lost, late, misdirected, illegible, incomplete, or inaccurate entries or technical, hardware, or software failures of any kind, for lost or unavailable network connections, or failed, incomplete, garbled, or delayed computer transmissions or any human error that may occur in the receipt or processing of the entries. If there is a dispute as to the identity of an online entrant, the prize will be awarded to the authorized account holder of the e-mail address. The “authorized account holder” is defined as the natural person to whom the phone number is assigned by a telephone service provider, online service provider, or other organization (e.g. business, educational institution, etc.) that is responsible for assigning phone number for the domain associated with the submitted phone number. Entries submitted by entrants who do not meet the eligibility (including all requirements with respect to age and residence) are void. The Website’s database clock will be the official timekeeper for this Sweepstakes. In the event a dispute regarding the identity of the individual who actually submitted an entry cannot be resolved to Sponsor’s satisfaction, the affected entry will be deemed ineligible.
TIMING: There will be twenty-one (21) drawings, each at 9:00 a.m. November 2, 2015. The Spurs Nation Giveaway contest will run online from 10/16/2015 through 11/1/2015.
ELIGIBILITY: The Sweepstakes is open to legal United States citizens who reside in the following eight (8) Texas counties: Atascosa, Bexar, Bandera, Comal, Guadalupe, Kendall, Medina and Wilson who are at least eighteen (18) years of age or older as of October 16, 2015 and have valid government-issued identification card. Employees of the Sponsor, San Antonio Express-News, mySA.com, Prime Time Newspapers, Conexión, its parents, affiliates and subsidiaries, participating advertising and promotion agencies, directors, officers and distributors, and other prize suppliers, (collectively, the Sweepstakes Entities”) and each of their immediate family members and/or those living in the same household of each are not eligible. Void where prohibited by law.
PRIZES: TOTAL VALUE OF ALL PRIZES: $2,839.79. There will be twenty-one (21) winners: one (1) grand-prize winner and twenty (20) subscription winners. Each potential winner will have the opportunity to win the following prize.
Prize list includes: Grand prize: One (1) Vizio E-Series 55-inch Class 1080p TV ($629.99 value) , one gift card to Wingstop for the equivalent of fifty-two 8-wing combos ($630.00) , and compensation for one year of cable/satellite service ($1,080 value); Subscription prizes: twenty (20) Spurs Nation Weekly magazine subscriptions ($499.80 value).
WINNER SELECTION/CONDITIONS of PARTICIPATION: Winning a prize will be predetermined based on probability assignment. Your confirmation as a winner is subject to phone and ID card verification. Winners for each day will be determined by if the entrant (player) receives a text message confirming they have won. The potential winners will be notified via a Text message that is sent from mySA.com to the phone number that was given on the official entry form, on or about one (1) day after the entry is submitted. If a winner is unreachable after one (1) days, or if that winner is unavailable for prize fulfillment, an alternate winner will be selected from all eligible entries. Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a prize of equal or greater value. Prizes are not transferable or redeemable for cash. The decision of the Sponsor is final and binding on all matters relating to the Sweepstakes. Expenses not specifically included in prize description and all taxes are the sole responsibility of the winner. Each prize is awarded “as is” with no warranty or guarantee, either expressed or implied, outside of manufacturer's limited warranty. No transfer, assignment or substitution of a prize permitted, except Sponsor reserves the right to substitute prize for an item of equal or greater value in the event an advertised prize is unavailable. All federal, state, provincial and local laws and regulations apply. Entrants agree to be bound by the terms of these Official Rules and by the decisions of Sponsor, which are final and binding on all matters pertaining to this Sweepstakes. Winners may be required to sign and return an Affidavit of Eligibility, a Liability Release, and where legally permissible, a Publicity Release at the time of prize verification. Failure to comply with these Official Rules may result in forfeiture of the prize. Winners hereby further agree that he/she will sign any documents necessary to transfer copyright of the entry to Sponsor at the time of verification. Acceptance of the prize constitutes permission for Sponsor and its agencies to use winner’s name and/or likeness, biographical material and/or entry (including an altered form of the entry) for advertising and promotional purposes without additional compensation, unless prohibited by law. By accepting prize, winner agrees to hold Sponsor, its advertising and promotion agencies and their respective parent companies, subsidiaries, affiliates, partners, representative agents, successors, assigns, officers, directors, and employees harmless for any injury or damage caused or claimed to be caused by participation in the Sweepstakes or acceptance or use of the prize. Sponsor is not responsible for any printing, typographical, mechanical or other error in the printing of the offer, administration of the Sweepstakes or in the announcement of the prize. mySA.com are not responsible for Internet crashes or slowdowns caused by network congestion, viruses, sabotage, satellite failures, phone line failures, electrical outages, natural disasters or acts of man or God. mySA.com reserves the right to change the rules at any time. Sponsor will be collecting personal information in accordance with its privacy policy. See Sponsor’s privacy policy at mySA.com for details regarding Sponsor’s information collection practices in connection with a Sweepstakes.
SECOND CHANCE DRAWING: Any unclaimed prizes will be awarded in a Second Chance drawing, assuming a sufficient number of entries. Each time you enter a valid phone number and complete an entry form, you will be automatically entered in the Second Chance Drawing. Winners will be determined from all eligible entries received in a random drawing to be conducted by the San Antonio Express-News within two (2) days. Odds of winning depend upon the number of unclaimed prizes and the number of eligible entries received.
WINNER NOTIFICATION: Winners (including those awarded via Second Chance) will be notified by telephone and may be required to sign and return a notarized Affidavit of Eligibility, a Liability Release, and a completed IRS W-9 form within seven (7) days following the date of first attempted notification. Failure to comply with this deadline, return of any prize/prize notification as undeliverable, Sponsor's inability to contact a potential prize winner within a reasonable time period or any potential prize winner's noncompliance with these Official Rules may result in disqualification and, at Sponsor's discretion, selection of an alternate winner from among all non-winning entries received.
WINNERS LIST: For winners’ names, send a separate self-addressed, stamped envelope to San Antonio Express-News, Spurs Nation Giveaway, 301 Avenue E at Third Street, San Antonio, TX, 78205 after November 2, 2015 .
DISPUTES/CHOICE OF LAW: Except where prohibited, each entrant agrees that: (1) any and all disputes, claims and causes of action arising out of or connected with this Sweepstakes or any prize awarded shall be resolved individually, without resort to any form of class action, and exclusively by state or federal courts situated in San Antonio, Texas , (2) any and all claims, judgments and awards shall be limited to actual out-of-pocket costs incurred, but in no event attorneys' fees; and (3) no punitive, incidental, special, consequential or other damages, including without limitation, lost profits, et cetera may be awarded (collectively, "Special Damages"), and (4) entrant hereby waives all rights to claim Special Damages and all rights to have such damages multiplied or increased. Texas law, without reference to Texas’s choice of law rules, governs the Promotion and all aspects related thereto.
SPONSOR: The Sponsors of this Sweepstakes are San Antonio Express-News and mySA.com (301 Avenue E at Third Street, San Antonio, Texas 78205).
Editor’s Note: This content is made possible by the San Antonio Express-News Circulation Department. It is not written by and does not necessarily reflect the views of The San Antonio Express-News' or mySanAntonio.com's editorial staff. Learn more about our advertising products at www.hearstmediasanantonio.com .
